description: End users may experience unexpected system behavior where unauthorized actions can be performed on their devices, potentially leading to unauthorized access or manipulation of sensitive files and settings. Affected Windows operating systems include build numbers: 10.0.22631.2715, 10.0.19043.3693, and 10.0.10240.20308, along with others listed in the update guides. Relevant KB articles include KB-5032199, KB-5032192, KB-5032190, and KB-5032189, which provide patches to address these vulnerabilities and enhance user system security.
